Name: Wolf Atelier
Review Text: The food was excellent. My and my friend enjoyed every little bit. The staff was brilliant as well. Real individuals and personal at the table. Definitely going back to this place. ‚Ä¶

Name: Wolf Atelier
Review Text: We had a very nice evening at Restaurant Wolf Atelier. The location is unique (built on an old railway bridge) with nice views. The 15-course tasting menu was very tasty and well worth the money. We went with 4 staff-suggested wines during the evening and didn't regret it. Worth a visit when you are visiting Amsterdam.

Review Text: An absolute roller-coaster of an experience. We came for one of the inventive fine dining + dance music events during ADE and the the night was riddled with miscommunication and hostile staff. ‚Ä¶

Name: Wolf Atelier

Good dishes and very informal setting.

Name: Wolf Atelier
Review Text: Truly delicious food and very good service. You definitely go there to spend quite some time. The dishes are small and served beautifully with wine pairing. I would highly recommend it for a business or a romantic dinner for two.

Name: Wolf Atelier
Review Text: Great hostess. Slow service. Not very inspiring food. Small dishes. We had to order extra bread to feel full after 5 courses. We had someone who didn't eat fish and someone who couldn't eat raw food. Replacement was uninspiring. There weren't any vegetarians but no vegetarian options on the menu.

Name: Wolf Atelier
Review Text: The food was fine. But we waited way too long for it to be served and it wasn't even busy. We had a two course lunch and it took approximately two hours. And when we asked for some more bread while waiting for our dishes, they forgot to bring it, we had to ask for it three times.

Name: Wolf Atelier
Review Text: We had the 15 courses menu with wine pairing and it was excellent. The service is very personal and the ambiance is very cozy but modern. Totally recommend it.

Name: Wolf Atelier

Review Text: Extraordinary place. All dishes made with a lot of passion, details and flavours. They really take care of everyone at their restaurant. It is worth having dinner there if you come to Amsterdam. ‚Ä¶

Review Text: As exciting for its location as its food: this dockland-esque structure floating above the water is ideal for meals on the smarter side of casual. Despite a perhaps slightly too polished experience at times, the service and dishes shine through nonetheless.

Name: Wolf Atelier
Review Text: Super interesting and tasty 15 course Muse meal. Service and ambience was great. Wine pairing / selection was okay, but not excellent. Only thing from preventing a 5 Star.

Name: Wolf Atelier
Review Text: Simply amazing. Would love to visit again

Name: Wolf Atelier

Name: Wolf Atelier
